column1: A funeral service will be held at 11:00 a.m. Monday
column3: 2015 at St. Thomas Aquinas Catholic Church. Interment will follow at Riverview Cemetery. The family will receive friends on Sunday June 14
column4: 2015 from 2:00 p.m. to 4:00 p.m. and then from 6:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m. at Hill and Wood Funeral Home.
